front.title: IEEE/ANSI Standard for the Programming Language Extended Pascal

author.organization: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

front.abstract: The standard provides an unambiguous and machine-independent definition of the computer programming language Extended Pascal by specifying requirements for a processor and for a conforming program. Its purpose is to facilitate portability of Extended Pascal programs for use on a wide variety of data processing systems. Two levels of compliance are defined for both processors and programs.
